citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:00 PM on
19-Dec-17.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensee’s house. Inspector waited the required 30 minutes for
licensee to show up to do a facility inspection.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:00 PM on
19-Dec-17.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensee’s house.   Inspector waited the required 30 minutes for
licensee to show up to do a facility inspection.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
